name: Carmen Sandiego: To Steal or Not to Steal
summary: You drive the action in this interactive adventure, helping Carmen save Ivy and Zack when V.I.L.E. captures them during a heist in Shanghai.
info:
• 中文名: 大神偷卡门：偷不偷？
